title: Colonial National Historical Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Jamestown Island Drive is Scheduled to CLOSE Starting August 1,2016  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Jamestown Island Drive is Scheduled to CLOSE Starting August 1,2016  Due to resurfacing, the Island Drive will be closed to everyone, including bicycles and pedestrians. It will be extremely hazardous for unauthorized persons to be in the work area, so safety is of prime importance.  Project to take many weeks. more
